original_title: Zeile für Zeile - ein Film über den Komponisten Ernstalbrecht Stiebler
overview: A cello piece A punt ride Thoughts about music and composition  The eight lines of Ernstalbrecht Stiebler’s cello piece Sequenz 2 alternating with his thoughts about slowness, space, reduction, repetition, resonance, liveliness and emotion  A cinematic continuum
title: Line by Line - a film on the composer Ernstalbrecht Stiebler
